Strings.Text: {scroll 0}Double crosser?\nWhat did he mean by that?{scroll 1}{timed 130}
{scroll 2}He couldn't have moved\nbecause of this injury...{scroll 1}{clear 0}{scroll 2}\nHe's holding something...{scroll 1}
{scroll 0}Wh-What? Oh no, I'm alone,\nbut why are you asking?{scroll 1}{timed 160}
{scroll 0}Listen! The ＳＴＡＲＳ are going\nto be finished soon.{scroll 1}{clear 90}{scroll 0}\nSomeone is a traitor.{scroll 1}{timed 72}
{scroll 0}Everything was plotted from\nthe start by Umbrella,{scroll 1}{clear 80}{scroll 0}\nAHH.... Ohhhh... cough... uhh{scroll 1}{timed 130}
{scroll 0}The ＳＴＡＲＳ are doomed.\nSomeone is a traitor.{scroll 1}{timed 130}
